column1: 1,Complete Order for Google Pixel 7 Pro Mobile Phone,"Navigate to the homepage, select Google Pixel 7 Pro, fill in shipping information, and complete the order. Verify that the homepage is displayed.","Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 3: Click on link mobileBrand (GooglePixel) -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
Step 6: Fill in shipping information and complete the order
